MemoryInfobox.name: The Decorated Dagger
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Learning of bandits who stole a fine dagger from a Blacksmith, a man thought to reclaim it for his own profit.'

General_Description: '''The Decorated Dagger''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra accepted a job for a man who had heard of a valuable [[dagger]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
